name: orh_canvas_plugin
description: OneRoom Health Canvas Plugin - Captures TEST-OneRoomHealth appointment events with comprehensive patient, provider, and scheduling data, then sends secure webhook notifications to OneRoom backend for real-time appointment management.

protocols.description: Responds to TEST-OneRoomHealth appointment lifecycle events (created, updated, booked, cancelled, rescheduled) and forwards comprehensive appointment, patient, and provider data to OneRoom backend via secure webhook.
